summary.OccupationArea: Landbrug, skovbrug, gartneri, fiskeri og dyrepleje

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: We are looking for an Arborist or forestworker with a good and long experience
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Due to expansion we are looking for a new Employee.

We are looking for a new employee with experience working within the green area.

We are looking for an Arborist or forestworker with a good and long experience.

Brændestakken is a company engaging 10-15 employees and works with treefelling, succeeding/accompanying all jobs to treefelling, pruning, planting, plantsale, design of gardens, forests and landscapes and execution of design and drawings. We also work with paving and boulderwalls.

 We perform all jobs within the green area.

An exciting and very challenging job where not two days are alike.  This job is for the applicant who have  experience with pruning of trees and bushes, plantning, chipping, hedgecutting , gardenwork,  and a good and basic  knowledge  about plants.

 

We are working on a high qualified professional basis and we are working with the best machinery in the industry for the jobs and the projects are executed with the highest expertise and quality possible

You will get the opportunity to develop yourself in the job and participate in designing and developing the projects, You work under the supervision of Robert and we awaits gladly input and ideas for the jobs, and you will work in experienced teams.

 

 

 

Working hours: 37 hours a week

Start:as quick as possible

The job is a permanent job for the right person 

In connection with the job we offer a good apartment and good colleagues in an international team of very dedicated employees.

 

Language. Preferably English speaking and, eventually German and if possible Danish
